casebody.data:
Brian METROCAVAGE and Shary Metrocavage, Appellants,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a the Bank of New York as Trustee for the Certificate Holders of CWABS 2004-2005; Nationstar Mortgage, LLC f/k/a Centex Home Equity Co., LLC; Bank of America, N.A. f/k/a BAC Home Loan Servicing, L.P.; Field Asset Services, Inc., Appellees. Case No. 2D17-3388 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed December 5, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
